attributes.action: Care and dignity for the elders of England
attributes.additional_details:
I want to help bring more money to be used and put back into Hospitals and the NHS, For the elderly people of Britain.  Our parents and there fore parents fought two world wars for what they belived in....Why?
not so there children and grandchildren could have  a better Britain, well that is what they thought....this is not the case anymore, so, it is upto us to fight for the sake of our children and grand children, who themselves will be old and in need of care one day!!!!!!
